text: George (Gia) Maisashvili () (November 24, 1962 – February 26, 2018) was a Georgian economist, human rights activist and politician. He was a presidential candidate in the Georgian presidential election of 2008. He was born in Tbilisi. After the Georgian Civil War and the overthrowing of the democratically elected government by Eduard Shevardnadze in 1992, Maisashvili was forced to flee the country and was granted a political asylum by the United States.List of Majoritarian MP Candidates. Civil Georgia, April 24, 2008. Maisashvili died in Tbilisi on February 26, 2018 of colorectal cancer at the age of 55.გია მაისაშვილი გარდაიცვალა ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Politicians from Georgia (country) Category:Economists Category:Human rights activists
title: Giorgi Maisashvili
